section.title: Description
section.p: Locates the first occurence in the string pointed to by s1 of the sequence of characters in the string pointed to by s2 (excluding the terminating null character).

section.title: Returns
section.p: Returns a pointer to the located string segment, or a null pointer if the string s2 is not found. If s2 points to a string with zero length, the s1 is returned.
